Schema.incarcare: CREATE TABLE `incarcare` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE, `data` INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, `siloz` INTEGER NOT NULL, `greutate` INTEGER NOT NULL)
Schema.descarcare: CREATE TABLE `descarcare` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE, `data` INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, `siloz` INTEGER NOT NULL, `greutate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `hala` INTEGER NOT NULL, `buncar` INTEGER NOT NULL)
Schema.logs: CREATE TABLE `logs` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT UNIQUE, `data` INTEGER NOT NULL, `msg` TEXT NOT NULL)
